name: Gishki Aquamirror
effectText: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Gishki" Ritual Monster. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. You can shuffle this card from the GY into the Deck, then target 1 "Gishki" Ritual Monster in your GY; add it to your hand.
